entry.title: Photos from The Modern Ferret's post
entry.summary: Here is a book my mom made when she was around 10 (the same age as the kid I now mentor through Royal Family Kids). My mom loved animals just like I do and just like my mentee does. I feel like she couldâ€™ve handed me this same hand-written book yesterday! Losing my mom unexpectedly has not been an easy journey but I am grateful for the community I have to share these special things with. I am also grateful that through the tears, Elijah is right next to me, sniffing the contents of this box.(Feed generated with FetchRSS)
